TEXT: You arrive a place you never been, is there your dream?
You keep walking, then see two rabbits are dancing. NL You don't know why call them rabbits, they seems are inviting you.
You dance with them, feel full of #gPotentiality .
You turn to find other way
You walk left for a while, then find you back there...
You right left for a while, then find you back there...
"Oh, you walk for so long, you have no place to go, do you?", NL A rabbit take out some #bdumplings , NL "If you don't to dance with us, just take these."
You eat these dumplings, it taste well. At the same time, you feel #gStrength crowd out
You see a strange person with a single wing.
"Ah,it's #ySagume sahib!"A rabbit appear from somewhere. NL "This visitor, #ySagume sahib can #pspeak #pill #pof you for #bfree~~"
"Ah--you don't want?"The rabbit looks very despair.
There is no card can be replaced in my hand.
